text: Kenneth Mars (April 4, 1935 - February 12, 2011) was an American actor. He was known for his roles in Young Frankenstein, The Little Mermaid, The Producers, and Malcolm in the Middle. ==Life and death== Mars was born on April 4, 1935 in Chicago, Illinois. He studied at Northwestern University. He was married to Barbara Newborn from 1977 until his death in 2011. They had two children. Mars died on February 13, 2011 in Granada Hills, Los Angeles, California from pancreatic cancer, aged 75. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1935 births Category:2011 deaths Category:Actors from Chicago Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Comedians from Chicago Category:Deaths from pancreatic cancer Category:Television personalities from Chicago
